name: Xeri - Ξερή
description: Xeri is a classic deck card game, that is played with 2 or 4 players. It is a generally fast game, in which the players can play one card per turn. The players aim to play the same card that the previous player played, to get as many points possible. Xeri is also a memory game, because it's essential for the players to remember the cards that have already passed.
